name: ChartDataLabelFormat
description: Encapsulates the format properties for the chart data labels.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: font
properties.description: Represents the font attributes (font name, font size, color, etc.) for a chart data label.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Represents the fill format of the current chart data label.
